articles.description: Is Miley Cyrus' "Flowers" about her ex-husband Liam Hemsworth? Read on for all the Easter eggs fans believe the singer dropped in her new breakup song.
articles.content:
Furthermore, fans believe that Miley gives a nod to her and Liam's once-shared Malibu home, which burned down in a California wildfire shortly before their wedding, in the song's first verse.

articles.title: Gina Lollobridgia's former toyboy husband says he'll be 'front row' at funeral - Daily Mail
articles.description: Speaking to newspaper ABC, Javier Rigau, from Spain, claimed Gina asked to see him before her death - despite the fact they were locked in legal battles over the past decade.
articles.content:
Gina Lollobrigida's former toyboy husband has promised he will be 'front row' at her funeral - despite their marriage being annulled by the Vatican.
